channel.title: Decimals
channel.description:
I was just wondering something:
Is there any clear way to understand 'Decimals' , Currently i'm setting up the basic economy for my 317 Server,
But i have to mess around with the decimals a fair bit to get the price That i require, So is there any clear way to understand it?
An example of it in 'Item.java' is :
[code]589.408958852495[/code]

item.title: Decimals
item.dc:creator: @Olzax Olzax
item.description:
@Olzax wrote:

[quote=“si force, post:1, topic:237679”]I was just wondering something:

Is there any clear way to understand ‘Decimals’ ,
Currently i’m setting up the basic economy for my 317 Server,

But i have to mess around with the decimals a fair bit to get the price
That i require, So is there any clear way to understand it?

An example of it in ‘Item.java’ is :

589.408958852495

let’s do some math
round it to 589.4
now lets say you sell 3 of something for this price

589.4
589.4
589.4
+_____
1768.2

so you get about 1 gp more because you sold 2-3 of them

Read full topic

item.title: Decimals
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:

I actually considered that from your and Noob pwner’s post,
I think i sussed it out now anyway,

Thanks for the help you guys.

Read full topic

item.title: Decimals
item.dc:creator: @noob_pwner noob pwner
item.description:
@noob_pwner wrote:

i don’t really think it changes anything visible, it’s just the price of the item that is calculated and put in there without rounding it out.
